title: If I didn't play ranked this season
body: Would it count me next season as unranked mmr or something?

replies.body: If you had 800 MMR, you would get soft reset to 1000 MMR at the start of this season, and 1100 MMR at the start of next season.
If you are already bronze then your MMR won't be much of a difference. The best thing to get out of bronze is to KNOW how to get out of it. Not by relying on MMR reset or whatsoever.
Doubt the MMR of an account changes due to "inactivity". Not playing ranked for a year wouldn't reset your MMR to base pretty sure.

Pretty sure it will count depending on last season.

So yea, still bronze mmr
